justification: “The intelligence quotient or IQ has been defined as a measure of the level of this ability [intelligence defined as general problem solving ability].”

measured_by: volume of conceptual space navigated per unit time (FMF metric)
justification: “In the FMF general problem solving ability is represented as the volume of conceptual space that can be navigated by the cognitive system per unit of time.”

measured_by: volume of outcomes per volume of inputs
justification: “Fitness is expressed in volume of outcomes per volume of inputs.”
construct: Fitness (to execute a process or function)
